Class AbstractSMTPClientSession

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.normanmaurer.niosmtp.transport.AbstractSMTPClientSession
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SMTPClientSession
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    NettyLMTPClientSession

    public abstract class AbstractSMTPClientSession
extends Object
implements SMTPClientSession
    Abstract base implementation of a SMTPClientSession
    Author:
    Norman Maurer

      • setAttribute

        public Object setAttribute(String key,
                  Object value)
        Description copied from interface: SMTPClientSession
        Allow to store a object to the SMTPClientSession with the given key. To remove a previous stored object just use a null value with the given key.
        Specified by:
        setAttribute in interface SMTPClientSession
        Parameters:
        key - the key under which the given value should be stored
        value - the value which should be stored under the given key or null if the previous stored value should just be removed
        Returns:
        storedValue the previous stored value or null if no value was stored before with the key

      • getAttribute

        public Object getAttribute(String key)
        Description copied from interface: SMTPClientSession
        Return the value which was stored under the key
        Specified by:
        getAttribute in interface SMTPClientSession
        Parameters:
        key - the key for which the value should be returned
        Returns:
        value the value for the given key or null if no value is stored under the given key

      • getSupportedExtensions

        public Set<String> getSupportedExtensions()
        Description copied from interface: SMTPClientSession
        Return a "read-only" Set of all supported EXTENSIONS. This will be set in the EHLO Response so you will get an empty Set before the EHLO Response was processed
        Specified by:
        getSupportedExtensions in interface SMTPClientSession
        Returns:
        extensions
